name: Rhythm Cube
description:
A game where you must follow the line color with a direction that tells you. 

Controls:

Start = SPACE

Red = Up, W

Yellow = Down, S

Green = Left, A

Blue = Right, D

Play Level = k

This game is still Work In Progress, need more improvements, levels and music, etc.. I am still a beginner and this game is only made without team or members. This game is currently lacking on music and level. If you like this game and willing to help for development, I would appreciate to leave a feedback in the comments, it will helps me out to improve this game.

If you press play and you only see "Press SPACE to start", try to go to main menu, go to the editor. Put a random objects in their, save, press "K" or play, and exit to the editor. Then press play again. You should see the level now.
